basics.name: Frank Pang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Sophomore at the University of Southern California majoring in Computer Science. Student Researcher at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. Student Intern at Shifted Energy

interests.name: Software Development, Web Development, and Health

education.institution: University of Southern California, Los Angeles, CA

highlights: Implementing the Stanford Parser and auto-correction APIs to fix text warnings about tsunamis, earthquakes, and volcano events for the Pacific Disaster Center.
Mentored and engaged incoming high school seniors who attended Atherton YMCA College Camp 3. Prepared team building activities and taught them about educational preparedness.
Member, USC Autonomous Underwater Vehicle Computer Vision Team, Spring 2018
Member, USC MEDesign Breathalyzer Team, Fall 2017 - Spring 2018
Member, USC Hawaii Club Fall 2017 - Spring 2018

awards.title: Computer Science Award
awards.summary: Awarded at the 2016 Hawaii State Science and Engineering Fair for my project, AIRIS. See my portfolio site for more details.

awards.title: Best in Computer Science
awards.summary: Awarded at the 2016 Honolulu District Science and Engineering Fair for my project, AIRIS. See my portfolio site for more details.

awards.title: JEJ Foundation Inc. Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship award given to 2 students under each department at the Hawaii Prince Kuhio Hotel.

awards.title: McKinley Foundation Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship award funded by the McKinley Foundation for extracurricular and academic achievement.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Academic honor given to students with a 3.5 GPA or above. Semesters Received: Fall 2017, Spring 2018.
